title: Outer measures and Caratheodory's construction
content: Proofs for most of the theorems in section 113 of [Fremlin1]

blocks.pretty:
thm caragenval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà OutMeas ‚Üí(CaraGen ` c0)= { s0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0))| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)),((c0 `(s1 ‚ãÇ s0))[+](c0 `(s1 \ s0)))=(c0 ` s1))})
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  syl2anc(c0 ‚àà OutMeas, (CaraGen ` c0)= { s0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0))| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)),((c0 `(s1 ‚ãÇ s0))[+](c0 `(s1 \ s0)))=(c0 ` s1))}, c0 ‚àà OutMeas, { s0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0))| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)),((c0 `(s1 ‚ãÇ s0))[+](c0 `(s1 \ s0)))=(c0 ` s1))} ‚àà ùïå)
  id(c0 ‚àà OutMeas)
  syl(c0 ‚àà OutMeas, { s0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0))| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)),((c0 `(s1 ‚ãÇ s0))[+](c0 `(s1 \ s0)))=(c0 ` s1))} ‚àà ùïå, P(‚ãÉ dom(c0))‚àà ùïå)
  pwexd(‚ãÉ dom(c0), universe, c0 ‚àà OutMeas)
  syl(c0 ‚àà OutMeas, ‚ãÉ dom(c0)‚àà ùïå, dom(c0)‚àà ùïå)
  dmexg(c0, come)
  uniexg(dom(c0), universe)
  rabexg(s0, P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)), universe, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)),((c0 `(s1 ‚ãÇ s0))[+](c0 `(s1 \ s0)))=(c0 ` s1)))
  fvmptg(hs0, c0, come, { s0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0))| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)),((c0 `(s1 ‚ãÇ s0))[+](c0 `(s1 \ s0)))=(c0 ` s1))}, universe, ccaragen, { s0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(hs0))| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(hs0)),((hs0 `(s1 ‚ãÇ s0))[+](hs0 `(s1 \ s0)))=(hs0 ` s1))})
  rabeqbidv(s0, P(‚ãÉ dom(hs0)), P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)), hs0 = c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(hs0)),((hs0 `(s1 ‚ãÇ s0))[+](hs0 `(s1 \ s0)))=(hs0 ` s1)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)),((c0 `(s1 ‚ãÇ s0))[+](c0 `(s1 \ s0)))=(c0 ` s1)))
  bitrd(hs0 = c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(hs0)),((hs0 `(s1 ‚ãÇ s0))[+](hs0 `(s1 \ s0)))=(hs0 ` s1)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)),((c0 `(s1 ‚ãÇ s0))[+](c0 `(s1 \ s0)))=(c0 ` s1)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)),((hs0 `(s1 ‚ãÇ s0))[+](hs0 `(s1 \ s0)))=(hs0 ` s1)))
  raleqdv(s1, P(‚ãÉ dom(hs0)), P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)), hs0 = c0, ((hs0 `(s1 ‚ãÇ s0))[+](hs0 `(s1 \ s0)))=(hs0 ` s1))
  pweqd(‚ãÉ dom(hs0), ‚ãÉ dom(c0), hs0 = c0)
  unieqd(dom(hs0), dom(c0), hs0 = c0)
  dmeq(hs0, c0)
  ralbidv(s1, P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)), hs0 = c0, ((hs0 `(s1 ‚ãÇ s0))[+](hs0 `(s1 \ s0)))=(hs0 ` s1), ((c0 `(s1 ‚ãÇ s0))[+](c0 `(s1 \ s0)))=(c0 ` s1))
  eqeq12d(((hs0 `(s1 ‚ãÇ s0))[+](hs0 `(s1 \ s0))), (hs0 ` s1), ((c0 `(s1 ‚ãÇ s0))[+](c0 `(s1 \ s0))), (c0 ` s1), hs0 = c0)
  oveq12d((hs0 `(s1 ‚ãÇ s0)), cxad, (hs0 `(s1 \ s0)), (c0 `(s1 ‚ãÇ s0)), (c0 `(s1 \ s0)), hs0 = c0)
  fveq1(hs0, c0, (s1 ‚ãÇ s0))
  fveq1(hs0, c0, (s1 \ s0))
  fveq1(hs0, c0, s1)
  df-caragen(hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, ‚ãÉ dom(c0))
  diff.cuni.s(s0, dom(c0))
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(come)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0))| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)),((c0 `(s1 ‚ãÇ s0))[+](c0 `(s1 \ s0)))=(c0 ` s1))})
  diff.cpw.s(s0, ‚ãÉ dom(hs0))
  diff.cuni.s(s0, dom(hs0))
  diff.cdm.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, ‚ãÉ dom(hs0))
  diff.cuni.s(s1, dom(hs0))
  diff.cdm.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, ‚ãÉ dom(c0))
  diff.cuni.s(s1, dom(c0))
  diff.cdm.s(s1, c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: isome
blocks.content: Express the predicate " ` O ` is an outer measure." Definition 113A of [Fremlin1] p. 19. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

  mpbird(w0, (c0 : P(c1)‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû)), (c0 : dom(c0)‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû)))

blocks.name: ome0
blocks.content: The outer measure of the empty set is 0 . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: omessle
blocks.content: The outer measure of a set is greater than or equal to the measure of a subset, Definition 113A (ii) of [Fremlin1] p. 19. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

  mpbird(w0, wcel(c2, cpw(cuni(cdm(c0)))), wss(c2, cuni(cdm(c0))))

  simplrd(w0, wral(hs1, cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))), wral(hs0, cpw(cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))))), wa(wa(wf(c0, cdm(c0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cdm(c0), cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))))), wceq(cfv(c0, emptycls), nat0)), wral(hs1, cpw(cdm(c0)), wi(wbr(cv(hs1), cdom, com), wbr(cfv(c0, cuni(cv(hs1))), cle, cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, cv(hs1)))))))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wa(wa(wa(wf(c0, cdm(c0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cdm(c0), cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))))), wceq(cfv(c0, emptycls), nat0)), wral(hs1, cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))), wral(hs0, cpw(cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))), wral(hs1, cpw(cdm(c0)), wi(wbr(cv(hs1), cdom, com), wbr(cfv(c0, cuni(cv(hs1))), cle, cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, cv(hs1))))))), wcel(c0, come))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c0, come), wa(wa(wa(wa(wf(c0, cdm(c0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cdm(c0), cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))))), wceq(cfv(c0, emptycls), nat0)), wral(hs1, cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))), wral(hs0, cpw(cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))), wral(hs1, cpw(cdm(c0)), wi(wbr(cv(hs1), cdom, com), wbr(cfv(c0, cuni(cv(hs1))), cle, cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, cv(hs1)))))))), wcel(c0, come))
  isome(hs1, hs0, c0, come)
  rspcva(hs1, c2, cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))), wral(hs0, cpw(cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs0, cpw(c2), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c0, c2))))
  bitrd(wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wral(hs0, cpw(cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs0, cpw(c2), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c0, c2))), wral(hs0, cpw(c2), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))

thm omessle(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)[‚â§](c0 ` c2))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà OutMeas)
  ‚ä£ c3 = ‚ãÉ dom(c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚äÜ c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚äÜ c2)
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ` c1)[‚â§](c0 ` c2), c1 ‚àà P(c2), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(c2),(c0 ` hs0)[‚â§](c0 ` c2)))

  ssexd(c1, c2, universe, w0)

  syl2anc(w0, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(c2),(c0 ` hs0)[‚â§](c0 ` c2)), c2 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(hs1),(c0 ` hs0)[‚â§](c0 ` hs1))))
  mpbird(w0, c2 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)), c2 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ dom(c0))
  syl6sseq(c2, ‚ãÉ dom(c0), c3, w0)
  syl(w0, (c2 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0))‚Üî c2 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ dom(c0)), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  ssexd(c2, c3, universe, w0)
  unidmex(c3, c0, come, w0)
  elpwg(c2, universe, ‚ãÉ dom(c0))
  simplrd(w0, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(hs1),(c0 ` hs0)[‚â§](c0 ` hs1))), (((c0 : dom(c0)‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àß dom(c0)= P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)))‚àß(c0 ` ‚àÖ)= 0), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà P(dom(c0)),(hs1[‚âº]_om ‚Üí(c0 ` ‚ãÉ hs1)[‚â§](sum^ `(c0 |` hs1)))))
  mpbid(w0, (((((c0 : dom(c0)‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àß dom(c0)= P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)))‚àß(c0 ` ‚àÖ)= 0)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(hs1),(c0 ` hs0)[‚â§](c0 ` hs1))))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà P(dom(c0)),(hs1[‚âº]_om ‚Üí(c0 ` ‚ãÉ hs1)[‚â§](sum^ `(c0 |` hs1))))), c0 ‚àà OutMeas)
  syl(w0, (c0 ‚àà OutMeas ‚Üî(((((c0 : dom(c0)‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àß dom(c0)= P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)))‚àß(c0 ` ‚àÖ)= 0)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(hs1),(c0 ` hs0)[‚â§](c0 ` hs1))))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà P(dom(c0)),(hs1[‚âº]_om ‚Üí(c0 ` ‚ãÉ hs1)[‚â§](sum^ `(c0 |` hs1)))))), c0 ‚àà OutMeas)
  isome(hs1, hs0, c0, come)

  bitrd(hs1 = c2, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(hs1),(c0 ` hs0)[‚â§](c0 ` hs1)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(c2),(c0 ` hs0)[‚â§](c0 ` c2)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(c2),(c0 ` hs0)[‚â§](c0 ` hs1)))
  raleqdv(hs0, P(hs1), P(c2), hs1 = c2, (c0 ` hs0)[‚â§](c0 ` hs1))

blocks.name: omedm
blocks.content: The domain of an outer measure is a power set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: caragensplit
blocks.content: If ` E ` is in the set generated by the Caratheodory's method, then it splits any set ` A ` in two parts such that the sum of the outer measures of the two parts is equal to the outer measure of the whole set ` A ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm caragensplit(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(cfv(c0, cin(c1, c2)), cxad, cfv(c0, cdif(c1, c2))), cfv(c0, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, come))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ccaragen, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cuni(cdm(c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, c4))
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(cfv(c0, cin(c1, c2)), cxad, cfv(c0, cdif(c1, c2))), cfv(c0, c1)), wcel(c1, cpw(cuni(cdm(c0)))), wral(hs0, cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))), wceq(co(cfv(c0, cin(cv(hs0), c2)), cxad, cfv(c0, cdif(cv(hs0), c2))), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))))
  syl6eleq(c1, cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))), cpw(c4), w0)
  mpbird(w0, wcel(c1, cpw(c4)), wss(c1, c4))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c1, cpw(c4)), wss(c1, c4)), wcel(c1, universe))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c1, universe), wss(c1, c4), wcel(c4, universe))
  unidmex(c4, c0, come, w0)
  ssexg(c1, c4, universe)
  elpwg(c1, universe, c4)
  pweqi(c4, cuni(cdm(c0)))
  simprd(w0, wral(hs0, cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))), wceq(co(cfv(c0, cin(cv(hs0), c2)), cxad, cfv(c0, cdif(cv(hs0), c2))), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c2, cpw(cuni(cdm(c0)))))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wcel(c2, cpw(cuni(cdm(c0)))), wral(hs0, cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))), wceq(co(cfv(c0, cin(cv(hs0), c2)), cxad, cfv(c0, cdif(cv(hs0), c2))), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))), wcel(c2, c3))
  caragenel(hs0, c2, c3, c0, w0)
  rspcva(hs0, c1, cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))), wceq(co(cfv(c0, cin(cv(hs0), c2)), cxad, cfv(c0, cdif(cv(hs0), c2))), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(cfv(c0, cin(c1, c2)), cxad, cfv(c0, cdif(c1, c2))), cfv(c0, c1)))
  eqeq12d(co(cfv(c0, cin(cv(hs0), c2)), cxad, cfv(c0, cdif(cv(hs0), c2))), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), co(cfv(c0, cin(c1, c2)), cxad, cfv(c0, cdif(c1, c2))), cfv(c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq12d(cfv(c0, cin(cv(hs0), c2)), cxad, cfv(c0, cdif(cv(hs0), c2)), cfv(c0, cin(c1, c2)), cfv(c0, cdif(c1, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fveq2d(c0, cin(cv(hs0), c2), cin(c1, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  ineq1(cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  fveq2d(c0, cdif(cv(hs0), c2), cdif(c1, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  difeq1(cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(co(cfv(c0, cin(c1, c2)), cxad, cfv(c0, cdif(c1, c2))), cfv(c0, c1)))
}

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((c0 `(c1 ‚ãÇ c2))[+](c0 `(c1 \ c2)))=(c0 ` c1))

  ‚ä£ c3 =(CaraGen ` c0)

  syl2anc(w0, ((c0 `(c1 ‚ãÇ c2))[+](c0 `(c1 \ c2)))=(c0 ` c1), c1 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)),((c0 `(hs0 ‚ãÇ c2))[+](c0 `(hs0 \ c2)))=(c0 ` hs0)))

  mpbid(w0, (c2 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)),((c0 `(hs0 ‚ãÇ c2))[+](c0 `(hs0 \ c2)))=(c0 ` hs0))), c2 ‚àà c3)

  eqeq12d(((c0 `(hs0 ‚ãÇ c2))[+](c0 `(hs0 \ c2))), (c0 ` hs0), ((c0 `(c1 ‚ãÇ c2))[+](c0 `(c1 \ c2))), (c0 ` c1), hs0 = c1)
  oveq12d((c0 `(hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)), cxad, (c0 `(hs0 \ c2)), (c0 `(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)), (c0 `(c1 \ c2)), hs0 = c1)
  fveq2d(c0, (hs0 ‚ãÇ c2), (c1 ‚ãÇ c2), hs0 = c1)

  difeq1(hs0, c1, c2)
  fveq2(hs0, c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)

  diff.hs0.w(((c0 `(c1 ‚ãÇ c2))[+](c0 `(c1 \ c2)))=(c0 ` c1))

blocks.name: caragenelss
blocks.content: An element of the Caratheodory's construction is a subset of the base set of the outer measure. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm caragenelss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, come))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ccaragen, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wceq(c1, cuni(cdm(c2)))
} = {
  mpbid(w0, wss(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cpw(c1)))
  eleqtrd(c0, cpw(c1), cpw(cuni(cdm(c2))), w0)
  simpld(w0, wcel(c0, cpw(cuni(cdm(c2)))), wral(hs0, cpw(cuni(cdm(c2))), wceq(co(cfv(c2, cin(cv(hs0), c0)), cxad, cfv(c2, cdif(cv(hs0), c0))), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wcel(c0, cpw(cuni(cdm(c2)))), wral(hs0, cpw(cuni(cdm(c2))), wceq(co(cfv(c2, cin(cv(hs0), c0)), cxad, cfv(c2, cdif(cv(hs0), c0))), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))))), wcel(c0, c3))
  caragenel(hs0, c0, c3, c2, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cpw(cuni(cdm(c2))), cpw(c1)))
  pweqi(cuni(cdm(c2)), c1)
  eqcomi(cuni(cdm(c2)), c1)
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(c0, c1)), wcel(c0, c3))
  elpwg(c0, c3, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

thm caragenelss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚äÜ c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà OutMeas)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(CaraGen ` c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ c1 = ‚ãÉ dom(c2)
} = {
  mpbid(w0, c0 ‚äÜ c1, c0 ‚àà P(c1))
  eleqtrd(c0, P(c1), P(‚ãÉ dom(c2)), w0)
  simpld(w0, c0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c2)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c2)),((c2 `(hs0 ‚ãÇ c0))[+](c2 `(hs0 \ c0)))=(c2 ` hs0)))

  caragenel(hs0, c0, c3, c2, w0)
  a1i(w0, P(‚ãÉ dom(c2))= P(c1))
  pweqi(‚ãÉ dom(c2), c1)
  eqcomi(‚ãÉ dom(c2), c1)
  syl(w0, (c0 ‚àà P(c1)‚Üî c0 ‚äÜ c1), c0 ‚àà c3)

}

blocks.name: carageneld
blocks.content: Membership in the Caratheodory's construction. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm carageneld(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, come))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(cdm(c2)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ccaragen, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cpw(c3)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c3))), wceq(co(cfv(c2, cin(cv(s0), c0)), cxad, cfv(c2, cdif(cv(s0), c0))), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cpw(cuni(cdm(c2)))), wral(s0, cpw(cuni(cdm(c2))), wceq(co(cfv(c2, cin(cv(s0), c0)), cxad, cfv(c2, cdif(cv(s0), c0))), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))))
  jca(w0, wcel(c0, cpw(cuni(cdm(c2)))), wral(s0, cpw(cuni(cdm(c2))), wceq(co(cfv(c2, cin(cv(s0), c0)), cxad, cfv(c2, cdif(cv(s0), c0))), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))))
  syl6eleq(c0, cpw(cuni(cdm(c2))), cpw(c3), w0)
  ralrimiva(s0, cpw(cuni(cdm(c2))), w0, wceq(co(cfv(c2, cin(cv(s0), c0)), cxad, cfv(c2, cdif(cv(s0), c0))), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cpw(cuni(cdm(c2))))), wceq(co(cfv(c2, cin(cv(s0), c0)), cxad, cfv(c2, cdif(cv(s0), c0))), cfv(c2, cv(s0))), w0, wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c3)))
  simpl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cpw(cuni(cdm(c2)))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cpw(cuni(cdm(c2)))), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c3)))
  biimpi(wcel(cv(s0), cpw(cuni(cdm(c2)))), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c3)))
  bicomi(wcel(cv(s0), cpw(cuni(cdm(c2)))), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c3)))
  eleq2i(cv(s0), cpw(c3), cpw(cuni(cdm(c2))))
  pweqi(c3, cuni(cdm(c2)))
  caragenel(s0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm carageneld(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà OutMeas)
  ‚ä£ c3 = ‚ãÉ dom(c2)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(CaraGen ` c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà P(c3))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà P(c3))‚Üí((c2 `(s0 ‚ãÇ c0))[+](c2 `(s0 \ c0)))=(c2 ` s0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, c0 ‚àà c1, (c0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c2))‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c2)),((c2 `(s0 ‚ãÇ c0))[+](c2 `(s0 \ c0)))=(c2 ` s0))))
  jca(w0, c0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c2)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c2)),((c2 `(s0 ‚ãÇ c0))[+](c2 `(s0 \ c0)))=(c2 ` s0)))
  syl6eleq(c0, P(‚ãÉ dom(c2)), P(c3), w0)
  ralrimiva(s0, P(‚ãÉ dom(c2)), w0, ((c2 `(s0 ‚ãÇ c0))[+](c2 `(s0 \ c0)))=(c2 ` s0))
  syl2anc((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c2))), ((c2 `(s0 ‚ãÇ c0))[+](c2 `(s0 \ c0)))=(c2 ` s0), w0, s0 ‚àà P(c3))
  simpl(w0, s0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c2)))
  adantl(w0, s0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c2)), s0 ‚àà P(c3))
  biimpi(s0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c2)), s0 ‚àà P(c3))
  bicomi(s0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c2)), s0 ‚àà P(c3))
  eleq2i(s0, P(c3), P(‚ãÉ dom(c2)))
  pweqi(c3, ‚ãÉ dom(c2))
  caragenel(s0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
}

blocks.name: omecl
blocks.content: The outer measure of a set is a nonnegative extended real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm omecl(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, come))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(cdm(c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, c2))
} = {
  ffvelrnd(c0, c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), cpw(c2), w0)
  omef(c0, c2, w0)
  mpbird(w0, wcel(c1, cpw(c2)), wss(c1, c2))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c1, cpw(c2)), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c1, universe))
  ssexd(c1, c2, universe, w0)
  eqeltrd(c2, universe, cuni(cdm(c0)), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(c2, cuni(cdm(c0))))
  syl(w0, wcel(cuni(cdm(c0)), universe), wcel(cdm(c0), universe))
  dmexd(c0, come, w0)
  uniexg(cdm(c0), universe)
  elpwg(c1, universe, c2)
}

blocks.name: omeunile
blocks.content: The outer measure of the union of a countable set is the less than or equal to the extended sum of the outer measures. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm omeunile(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(c0, cuni(c1)), cle, cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, c1))))

  -| wceq(c2, cuni(cdm(c0)))

} = {

  pwexd(c2, universe, w0)
  unidmex(c2, c0, come, w0)
  ssexg(c1, cpw(c2), universe)
  elpwg(c1, universe, cpw(c2))
  pweqd(cpw(c2), cdm(c0), w0)
  eqtr2d(cpw(c2), cdm(c0), cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cdm(c0), cpw(cuni(cdm(c0)))), wcel(c0, come))
  omedm(c0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))), cpw(c2)))
  eqcomi(cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))), cpw(c2))
  pweqi(c2, cuni(cdm(c0)))
  simprd(w0, wral(hs0, cpw(cdm(c0)), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wbr(cfv(c0, cuni(cv(hs0))), cle, cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, cv(hs0)))))), wa(wa(wa(wf(c0, cdm(c0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cdm(c0), cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))))), wceq(cfv(c0, emptycls), nat0)), wral(hs0, cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))), wral(hs1, cpw(cv(hs0)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))))))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wa(wa(wa(wf(c0, cdm(c0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cdm(c0), cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))))), wceq(cfv(c0, emptycls), nat0)), wral(hs0, cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))), wral(hs1, cpw(cv(hs0)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))))), wral(hs0, cpw(cdm(c0)), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wbr(cfv(c0, cuni(cv(hs0))), cle, cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, cv(hs0))))))), wcel(c0, come))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c0, come), wa(wa(wa(wa(wf(c0, cdm(c0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cdm(c0), cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))))), wceq(cfv(c0, emptycls), nat0)), wral(hs0, cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))), wral(hs1, cpw(cv(hs0)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))))), wral(hs0, cpw(cdm(c0)), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wbr(cfv(c0, cuni(cv(hs0))), cle, cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, cv(hs0)))))))), wcel(c0, come))
  isome(hs0, hs1, c0, come)
  rspcva(hs0, c1, cpw(cdm(c0)), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wbr(cfv(c0, cuni(cv(hs0))), cle, cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, cv(hs0))))), wi(wbr(c1, cdom, com), wbr(cfv(c0, cuni(c1)), cle, cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, c1)))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wbr(cfv(c0, cuni(cv(hs0))), cle, cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, cv(hs0)))), wbr(c1, cdom, com), wbr(cfv(c0, cuni(c1)), cle, cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, c1))))

  breq12d(cfv(c0, cuni(cv(hs0))), cle, cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, cv(hs0))), cfv(c0, cuni(c1)), cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))

thm omeunile(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` ‚ãÉ c1)[‚â§](sum^ `(c0 |` c1)))

  syl(w0, (c1 ‚àà P(P(c2))‚Üî c1 ‚äÜ P(c2)), c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl2anc(w0, c1 ‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚äÜ P(c2), P(c2)‚àà ùïå)
  pwexd(c2, universe, w0)
  unidmex(c2, c0, come, w0)
  ssexg(c1, P(c2), universe)
  elpwg(c1, universe, P(c2))
  pweqd(P(c2), dom(c0), w0)
  eqtr2d(P(c2), dom(c0), P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)), w0)
  syl(w0, dom(c0)= P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)), c0 ‚àà OutMeas)
  omedm(c0)
  a1i(w0, P(‚ãÉ dom(c0))= P(c2))
  eqcomi(P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)), P(c2))
  pweqi(c2, ‚ãÉ dom(c0))
  simprd(w0, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(dom(c0)),(hs0[‚âº]_om ‚Üí(c0 ` ‚ãÉ hs0)[‚â§](sum^ `(c0 |` hs0)))), ((((c0 : dom(c0)‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àß dom(c0)= P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)))‚àß(c0 ` ‚àÖ)= 0)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà P(hs0),(c0 ` hs1)[‚â§](c0 ` hs0)))))
  mpbid(w0, (((((c0 : dom(c0)‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àß dom(c0)= P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)))‚àß(c0 ` ‚àÖ)= 0)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà P(hs0),(c0 ` hs1)[‚â§](c0 ` hs0))))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(dom(c0)),(hs0[‚âº]_om ‚Üí(c0 ` ‚ãÉ hs0)[‚â§](sum^ `(c0 |` hs0))))), c0 ‚àà OutMeas)
  syl(w0, (c0 ‚àà OutMeas ‚Üî(((((c0 : dom(c0)‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àß dom(c0)= P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)))‚àß(c0 ` ‚àÖ)= 0)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà P(hs0),(c0 ` hs1)[‚â§](c0 ` hs0))))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(dom(c0)),(hs0[‚âº]_om ‚Üí(c0 ` ‚ãÉ hs0)[‚â§](sum^ `(c0 |` hs0)))))), c0 ‚àà OutMeas)
  isome(hs0, hs1, c0, come)
  rspcva(hs0, c1, P(dom(c0)), (hs0[‚âº]_om ‚Üí(c0 ` ‚ãÉ hs0)[‚â§](sum^ `(c0 |` hs0))), (c1[‚âº]_om ‚Üí(c0 ` ‚ãÉ c1)[‚â§](sum^ `(c0 |` c1))))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c1, hs0[‚âº]_om, (c0 ` ‚ãÉ hs0)[‚â§](sum^ `(c0 |` hs0)), c1[‚âº]_om, (c0 ` ‚ãÉ c1)[‚â§](sum^ `(c0 |` c1)))
  breq1(hs0, c1, cdom, com)
  breq12d((c0 ` ‚ãÉ hs0), cle, (sum^ `(c0 |` hs0)), (c0 ` ‚ãÉ c1), (sum^ `(c0 |` c1)), hs0 = c1)
  fveq2d(c0, ‚ãÉ hs0, ‚ãÉ c1, hs0 = c1)
  unieq(hs0, c1)
  fveq2d(csumge0, (c0 |` hs0), (c0 |` c1), hs0 = c1)
  reseq2(hs0, c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(P(dom(c0)))
  diff.hs0.w((c1[‚âº]_om ‚Üí(c0 ` ‚ãÉ c1)[‚â§](sum^ `(c0 |` c1))))
}

blocks.name: caragen0
blocks.content: The empty set belongs to any Caratheodory's construction. First part of Step (b) in the proof of Theorem 113C of [Fremlin1] p. 19. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm caragen0(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(emptycls, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, come))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(ccaragen, c1))
} = {
  carageneld(hs0, emptycls, c0, c1, cuni(cdm(c1)), w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(emptycls, cpw(cuni(cdm(c1)))))
  0elpw(cuni(cdm(c1)))
  3eqtrd(co(cfv(c1, cin(cv(hs0), emptycls)), cxad, cfv(c1, cdif(cv(hs0), emptycls))), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), co(cfv(c1, emptycls), cxad, cfv(c1, cv(hs0))), co(nat0, cxad, cfv(c1, cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cuni(cdm(c1))))))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cuni(cdm(c1))))), wceq(co(cfv(c1, cin(cv(hs0), emptycls)), cxad, cfv(c1, cdif(cv(hs0), emptycls))), co(cfv(c1, emptycls), cxad, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))))
  oveq12i(cfv(c1, cin(cv(hs0), emptycls)), cxad, cfv(c1, cdif(cv(hs0), emptycls)), cfv(c1, emptycls), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))
  fveq2i(c1, cin(cv(hs0), emptycls), emptycls)
  in0(cv(hs0))
  fveq2i(c1, cdif(cv(hs0), emptycls), cv(hs0))
  dif0(cv(hs0))
  oveq1d(cfv(c1, emptycls), cxad, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), nat0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cuni(cdm(c1))))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cuni(cdm(c1)))), wceq(cfv(c1, emptycls), nat0))
  ome0(c1, w0)
  xaddid2d(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cuni(cdm(c1))))))
  sseldi(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cxr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cuni(cdm(c1))))))
  iccssxr(nat0, cpnf)
  omecl(c1, cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(c1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cuni(cdm(c1))))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cuni(cdm(c1)))), wcel(c1, come))
  eqid(cuni(cdm(c1)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cuni(cdm(c1)))), wss(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(c1))))
  elpwi(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

thm caragen0(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí ‚àÖ ‚àà c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà OutMeas)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(CaraGen ` c1)
} = {

  a1i((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c1))), ((c1 `(hs0 ‚ãÇ ‚àÖ))[+](c1 `(hs0 \ ‚àÖ)))=((c1 ` ‚àÖ)[+](c1 ` hs0)))
  oveq12i((c1 `(hs0 ‚ãÇ ‚àÖ)), cxad, (c1 `(hs0 \ ‚àÖ)), (c1 ` ‚àÖ), (c1 ` hs0))
  fveq2i(c1, (hs0 ‚ãÇ ‚àÖ), emptycls)

  oveq1d((c1 ` ‚àÖ), cxad, (c1 ` hs0), nat0, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c1))))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c1)), (c1 ` ‚àÖ)= 0)
  ome0(c1, w0)
  xaddid2d((c1 ` hs0), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c1))))
  sseldi((c1 ` hs0), cxr, (0[[,]]+‚àû), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c1))))
  iccssxr(nat0, cpnf)

blocks.name: omexrcl
blocks.content: The outer measure of a set is an extended real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: caragenunidm
blocks.content: The base set of an outer measure belongs to the sigma-algebra generated by the Caratheodory's construction. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm caragenunidm(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, come))
  -| wceq(c0, cuni(cdm(c2)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ccaragen, c2))
} = {
  carageneld(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c0, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cpw(c0)), wcel(c0, universe))
  syl5eqel(c0, universe, cuni(cdm(c2)), w0)
  3syl(w0, wcel(cuni(cdm(c2)), universe), wcel(c2, come), wcel(cdm(c2), universe))
  dmexg(c2, come)
  uniexg(cdm(c2), universe)
  pwidg(c0, universe)
  3eqtrd(co(cfv(c2, cin(cv(hs0), c0)), cxad, cfv(c2, cdif(cv(hs0), c0))), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cxad, nat0), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0))))
  oveq12d(cfv(c2, cin(cv(hs0), c0)), cxad, cfv(c2, cdif(cv(hs0), c0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), nat0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wceq(cfv(c2, cin(cv(hs0), c0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))))
  fveq2d(c2, cin(cv(hs0), c0), cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wceq(cin(cv(hs0), c0), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c0))
  biimpi(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cin(cv(hs0), c0), cv(hs0)))
  df-ss(cv(hs0), c0)
  eqtrd(cfv(c2, cdif(cv(hs0), c0)), nat0, cfv(c2, emptycls), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wceq(cfv(c2, cdif(cv(hs0), c0)), cfv(c2, emptycls)))
  fveq2d(c2, cdif(cv(hs0), c0), emptycls, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)))
  sylib(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wceq(cdif(cv(hs0), c0), emptycls), wss(cv(hs0), c0))
  ssdif0(cv(hs0), c0)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wceq(cfv(c2, emptycls), nat0))
  ome0(c2, w0)
  xaddid1d(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0))))
  sseldi(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cxr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0))))
  iccssxr(nat0, cpnf)
  omecl(c2, cv(hs0), c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wcel(c2, come))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wss(cv(hs0), c0))
  elpwi(cv(hs0), c0)
  eqidd(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm caragenunidm(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà OutMeas)
  ‚ä£ c0 = ‚ãÉ dom(c2)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(CaraGen ` c2)
} = {
  carageneld(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c0, w0)
  syl(w0, c0 ‚àà P(c0), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl5eqel(c0, universe, ‚ãÉ dom(c2), w0)
  3syl(w0, ‚ãÉ dom(c2)‚àà ùïå, c2 ‚àà OutMeas, dom(c2)‚àà ùïå)
  dmexg(c2, come)
  uniexg(dom(c2), universe)
  pwidg(c0, universe)
  3eqtrd(((c2 `(hs0 ‚ãÇ c0))[+](c2 `(hs0 \ c0))), (c2 ` hs0), ((c2 ` hs0)[+]0), (c2 ` hs0), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(c0)))
  oveq12d((c2 `(hs0 ‚ãÇ c0)), cxad, (c2 `(hs0 \ c0)), (c2 ` hs0), nat0, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(c0)))
  adantl(w0, hs0 ‚àà P(c0), (c2 `(hs0 ‚ãÇ c0))=(c2 ` hs0))
  fveq2d(c2, (hs0 ‚ãÇ c0), hs0, hs0 ‚àà P(c0))
  syl(hs0 ‚àà P(c0), (hs0 ‚ãÇ c0)= hs0, hs0 ‚äÜ c0)
  biimpi(hs0 ‚äÜ c0, (hs0 ‚ãÇ c0)= hs0)
  df-ss(hs0, c0)
  eqtrd((c2 `(hs0 \ c0)), nat0, (c2 ` ‚àÖ), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(c0)))
  adantl(w0, hs0 ‚àà P(c0), (c2 `(hs0 \ c0))=(c2 ` ‚àÖ))
  fveq2d(c2, (hs0 \ c0), emptycls, hs0 ‚àà P(c0))
  sylib(hs0 ‚àà P(c0), (hs0 \ c0)= ‚àÖ, hs0 ‚äÜ c0)
  ssdif0(hs0, c0)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà P(c0), (c2 ` ‚àÖ)= 0)
  ome0(c2, w0)
  xaddid1d((c2 ` hs0), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(c0)))
  sseldi((c2 ` hs0), cxr, (0[[,]]+‚àû), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(c0)))
  iccssxr(nat0, cpnf)
  omecl(c2, hs0, c0, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(c0)))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà P(c0), c2 ‚àà OutMeas)
  adantl(w0, hs0 ‚àà P(c0), hs0 ‚äÜ c0)
  elpwi(hs0, c0)
  eqidd((c2 ` hs0), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: caragensspw
blocks.content: The sigma-algebra generated from an outer measure, by the Caratheodory's construction, is a subset of the power set of the base set of the outer measure. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm caragensspw(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(c0, cpw(c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, come))
  -| wceq(c1, cuni(cdm(c2)))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(ccaragen, c2))
} = {
  sseqtrd(c0, cpw(c1), cpw(cuni(cdm(c2))), w0)
  sstrd(c0, cpw(cuni(cdm(c2))), cdm(c2), w0)
  syl(w0, wss(c0, cdm(c2)), wcel(c2, come))
  caragenss(c2, c0)
  a1i(w0, wss(cdm(c2), cpw(cuni(cdm(c2)))))
  pwuni(cdm(c2))
  a1i(w0, wceq(cpw(cuni(cdm(c2))), cpw(c1)))
  eqcomi(cpw(cuni(cdm(c2))), cpw(c1))
  pweqi(c1, cuni(cdm(c2)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm caragensspw(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚äÜ P(c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà OutMeas)
  ‚ä£ c1 = ‚ãÉ dom(c2)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(CaraGen ` c2)
} = {
  sseqtrd(c0, P(c1), P(‚ãÉ dom(c2)), w0)
  sstrd(c0, P(‚ãÉ dom(c2)), dom(c2), w0)
  syl(w0, c0 ‚äÜ dom(c2), c2 ‚àà OutMeas)
  caragenss(c2, c0)
  a1i(w0, dom(c2)‚äÜ P(‚ãÉ dom(c2)))
  pwuni(dom(c2))
  a1i(w0, P(‚ãÉ dom(c2))= P(c1))
  eqcomi(P(‚ãÉ dom(c2)), P(c1))
  pweqi(c1, ‚ãÉ dom(c2))
}

blocks.name: omessre
blocks.content: If the outer measure of a set is real, then the outer measure of any of its subset is real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm omessre(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, come))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(cdm(c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c3, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c3), cr))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, c3))
} = {
  sseldi(cfv(c0, c1), cr, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), w0)
  rge0ssre()
  elicod(cfv(c0, c1), nat0, cpnf, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c0, c1)), wcel(nat0, cxr), wcel(cpnf, cxr), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  a1i(w0, wcel(nat0, cxr))
  0xr()
  omecl(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  iccgelb(nat0, cpnf, cfv(c0, c1))
  xrlelttrd(cfv(c0, c1), cpnf, cfv(c0, c3), w0)
  omexrcl(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  sstrd(c1, c2, c3, w0)
  rexrd(cfv(c0, c3), w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  pnfxr()
  omessle(c0, c1, c3, c2, w0)
  ltpnfd(cfv(c0, c3), w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm omessre(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)‚àà ‚Ñù)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà OutMeas)
  ‚ä£ c2 = ‚ãÉ dom(c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚äÜ c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c3)‚àà ‚Ñù)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚äÜ c3)
} = {
  sseldi((c0 ` c1), cr, (0[[,)]+‚àû), w0)
  rge0ssre()
  elicod((c0 ` c1), nat0, cpnf, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, 0[‚â§](c0 ` c1), 0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, +‚àû ‚àà ‚Ñù*, (c0 ` c1)‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû))
  a1i(w0, 0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*)
  0xr()
  omecl(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  iccgelb(nat0, cpnf, (c0 ` c1))
  xrlelttrd((c0 ` c1), cpnf, (c0 ` c3), w0)
  omexrcl(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  sstrd(c1, c2, c3, w0)
  rexrd((c0 ` c3), w0)
  a1i(w0, +‚àû ‚àà ‚Ñù*)
  pnfxr()
  omessle(c0, c1, c3, c2, w0)
  ltpnfd((c0 ` c3), w0)
}

blocks.name: caragenuni
blocks.content: The base set of the sigma-algebra generated by the Caratheodory's construction is the whole base set of the original outer measure. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm caragenuni(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(cdm(c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, come))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(ccaragen, c1))
} = {
  eqssd(cuni(c0), cuni(cdm(c1)), w0)
  unissd(c0, cdm(c1), w0)
  syl(w0, wss(c0, cdm(c1)), wcel(c1, come))
  caragenss(c1, c0)
  syl(w0, wss(cuni(cdm(c1)), cuni(c0)), wcel(cuni(cdm(c1)), c0))
  caragenunidm(cuni(cdm(c1)), c0, c1, w0)
  eqid(cuni(cdm(c1)))
  elssuni(cuni(cdm(c1)), c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm caragenuni(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí ‚ãÉ c0 = ‚ãÉ dom(c1))

blocks.name: omeunle
blocks.content: The outer measure of the union of two sets is less than or equal to the sum of the measures, Remark 113B (c) of [Fremlin1] p. 19. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

thm omeunle(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

  omef(c0, c3, w0)

blocks.name: omelesplit
blocks.content: The outer measure of a set ` A ` is less than or equal to the extended addition of the outer measures of the decomposition induced on ` A ` by any ` E ` . Step (a) in the proof of Caratheodory's Method, Theorem 113C of [Fremlin1] p. 19. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm omelesplit(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(c0, c1), cle, co(cfv(c0, cin(c1, c2)), cxad, cfv(c0, cdif(c1, c2)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, come))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(cdm(c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, c3))
} = {
  eqbrtrd(cfv(c0, c1), cle, co(cfv(c0, cin(c1, c2)), cxad, cfv(c0, cdif(c1, c2))), cfv(c0, cun(cin(c1, c2), cdif(c1, c2))), w0)
  fveq2d(c0, c1, cun(cin(c1, c2), cdif(c1, c2)), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(c1, cun(cin(c1, c2), cdif(c1, c2))))
  eqcomi(c1, cun(cin(c1, c2), cdif(c1, c2)))
  inundif(c1, c2)
  omeunle(c0, cin(c1, c2), cdif(c1, c2), c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wss(cin(c1, c2), c3), wss(c1, c3))
  ssinss1(c1, c3, c2)
  ssdifssd(c1, c2, c3, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm omelesplit(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)[‚â§]((c0 `(c1 ‚ãÇ c2))[+](c0 `(c1 \ c2))))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà OutMeas)
  ‚ä£ c3 = ‚ãÉ dom(c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚äÜ c3)
} = {
  eqbrtrd((c0 ` c1), cle, ((c0 `(c1 ‚ãÇ c2))[+](c0 `(c1 \ c2))), (c0 `((c1 ‚ãÇ c2)‚ãÉ(c1 \ c2))), w0)
  fveq2d(c0, c1, ((c1 ‚ãÇ c2)‚ãÉ(c1 \ c2)), w0)
  a1i(w0, c1 =((c1 ‚ãÇ c2)‚ãÉ(c1 \ c2)))
  eqcomi(c1, ((c1 ‚ãÇ c2)‚ãÉ(c1 \ c2)))
  inundif(c1, c2)
  omeunle(c0, (c1 ‚ãÇ c2), (c1 \ c2), c3, w0)
  syl(w0, (c1 ‚ãÇ c2)‚äÜ c3, c1 ‚äÜ c3)
  ssinss1(c1, c3, c2)
  ssdifssd(c1, c2, c3, w0)
}

blocks.name: omeiunlempt
blocks.content: The outer measure of the indexed union of a countable set is the less than or equal to the extended sum of the outer measures. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm omeiunlempt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(c0, ciun(s0, c1, c2)), cle, cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, c2)))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, come))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(cdm(c0)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wss(c2, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wbr(cfv(c0, ciun(s0, c1, c2)), cle, cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, c2)))), wbr(cfv(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(s0)))), cle, cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(s0)))))))
  omeiunle(s0, c0, c1, cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c3, c4, w0)
  nfmpt1(s0, c1, c2)
  fmptdf(s0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c1, cpw(c3), c2, w0)
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, cpw(c3)), wss(c2, c3))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wb(wcel(c2, cpw(c3)), wss(c2, c3)), wcel(c2, universe))
  elpwg(c2, universe, c3)
  breq12d(cfv(c0, ciun(s0, c1, c2)), cle, cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, c2))), cfv(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(s0)))), cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(s0))))), w0)
  fveq2d(c0, ciun(s0, c1, c2), ciun(s0, c1, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(s0))), w0)
  iuneq2df(s0, c1, c2, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(s0)), w0)
  fveq2d(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, c2)), cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(s0)))), w0)
  mpteq2da(s0, c1, cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(s0))), w0)
  fveq2d(c0, c2, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  eqcomd(c2, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(s0)), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c2, universe))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1))

blocks.name: carageniuncllem1
blocks.content: The outer measure of ` A i^i ( G `` n ) ` is the sum of the outer measures of ` A i^i ( F `` m ) ` . These are lines 7 to 10 of Step (d) in the proof of Theorem 113C of [Fremlin1] p. 20. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: carageniuncl
blocks.content: The Caratheodory's construction is closed under indexed countable union. Step (d) in the proof of Theorem 113C of [Fremlin1] p. 20. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: caragenunicl
blocks.content: The Caratheodory's construction is closed under countable union. Step (d) in the proof of Theorem 113C of [Fremlin1] p. 20. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

  syl2anc(wa(w0, wne(c0, emptycls)), wex(hs0, wfo(cv(hs0), cn, c0)), wbr(emptycls, csdm, c0), wbr(c0, cdom, cn))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wne(c0, emptycls)), wbr(emptycls, csdm, c0), wne(c0, emptycls))
  simpr(w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  syl(wa(w0, wne(c0, emptycls)), wb(wbr(emptycls, csdm, c0), wne(c0, emptycls)), wcel(c0, universe))

  ex(w0, wfo(cv(hs0), cn, c0), wcel(cuni(c0), c1))

  nnuz()

  mpbird((w0 ‚àß c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ), ‚àÖ[‚â∫]c0, c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  simpr(w0, c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ)

blocks.name: caragensal
blocks.content: Caratheodory's method generates a sigma-algebra. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm caragensal(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, csalg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, come))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(ccaragen, c1))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wcel(c0, csalg), w3a(wcel(emptycls, c0), wral(hs0, c0, wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)), c0)), wral(hs0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0)))))
  3jca(w0, wcel(emptycls, c0), wral(hs0, c0, wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)), c0)), wral(hs0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0))))
  caragen0(c0, c1, w0)
  ralrimiva(hs0, c0, w0, wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)), c0))
  caragendifcl(c0, cv(hs0), c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c1, come))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cpw(c0), w0, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0)))
  ex(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0))), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0))
  caragenunicl(cv(hs0), c0, c1, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0))), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com)))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(c1, come))
  ad2antlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wss(cv(hs0), c0))
  elpwi(cv(hs0), c0)
  simpr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0))), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c0, csalg), w3a(wcel(emptycls, c0), wral(hs0, c0, wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)), c0)), wral(hs0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  a1i(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
  fvexi(c0, ccaragen, c1)
  issal(hs0, c0, universe)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm caragensal(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà SAlg)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà OutMeas)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(CaraGen ` c1)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, c0 ‚àà SAlg, (‚àÖ ‚àà c0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(‚ãÉ c0 \ hs0)‚àà c0)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(c0),(hs0[‚âº]_om ‚Üí ‚ãÉ hs0 ‚àà c0))))
  3jca(w0, ‚àÖ ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(‚ãÉ c0 \ hs0)‚àà c0), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(c0),(hs0[‚âº]_om ‚Üí ‚ãÉ hs0 ‚àà c0)))
  caragen0(c0, c1, w0)
  ralrimiva(hs0, c0, w0, (‚ãÉ c0 \ hs0)‚àà c0)
  caragendifcl(c0, hs0, c1, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c0))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà OutMeas)
  simpr(w0, hs0 ‚àà c0)
  ralrimiva(hs0, P(c0), w0, (hs0[‚âº]_om ‚Üí ‚ãÉ hs0 ‚àà c0))
  ex((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(c0)), hs0[‚âº]_om, ‚ãÉ hs0 ‚àà c0)
  caragenunicl(hs0, c0, c1, ((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(c0))‚àß hs0[‚âº]_om))
  ad2antrr(w0, hs0 ‚àà P(c0), hs0[‚âº]_om, c1 ‚àà OutMeas)
  ad2antlr(w0, hs0 ‚àà P(c0), hs0[‚âº]_om, hs0 ‚äÜ c0)
  elpwi(hs0, c0)
  simpr((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(c0)), hs0[‚âº]_om)
  syl(w0, (c0 ‚àà SAlg ‚Üî(‚àÖ ‚àà c0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(‚ãÉ c0 \ hs0)‚àà c0)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(c0),(hs0[‚âº]_om ‚Üí ‚ãÉ hs0 ‚àà c0)))), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  a1i(w0, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvexi(c0, ccaragen, c1)
  issal(hs0, c0, universe)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: caratheodorylem2
blocks.content: Caratheodory's construction is sigma-additive. Main part of Step (e) in the proof of Theorem 113C of [Fremlin1] p. 21. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm caratheodorylem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, ciun(s0, cn, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))), cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, cn, cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, come))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(cdm(c0)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ccaragen, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, cn, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wdisj(s0, cn, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpt(s1, cn, ciun(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), cfv(c1, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  xrletrid(cfv(c0, ciun(s0, cn, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))), cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, cn, cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))), w0)
  sge0xrcl(cmpt(s0, cn, cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))), cn, universe, w0)
  omeiunle(s0, c0, cn, c1, c2, nat1, w0)

blocks.name: caratheodory
blocks.content: Caratheodory's construction of a measure given an outer measure. Proof of Theorem 113C of [Fremlin1] p. 19. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm caratheodory(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cres(c0, c1), cmea))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, come))

} = {
  ismeannd(hs0, hs1, cres(c0, c1), c1, w0)

  eqtr2d(c1, crab(hs0, cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))), wral(hs2, cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))), wceq(co(cfv(c0, cin(cv(hs2), cv(hs0))), cxad, cfv(c0, cdif(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)))), cfv(c0, cv(hs2))))), cfv(ccaragen, c0), w0)
  eqcomd(crab(hs0, cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))), wral(hs2, cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))), wceq(co(cfv(c0, cin(cv(hs2), cv(hs0))), cxad, cfv(c0, cdif(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)))), cfv(c0, cv(hs2))))), cfv(ccaragen, c0), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(ccaragen, c0), crab(hs0, cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))), wral(hs2, cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))), wceq(co(cfv(c0, cin(cv(hs2), cv(hs0))), cxad, cfv(c0, cdif(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)))), cfv(c0, cv(hs2)))))), wcel(c0, come))
  caragenval(hs0, hs2, c0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cfv(ccaragen, c0), c1))
  eqcomi(cfv(ccaragen, c0), c1)
  ssrab2(hs0, cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))), wral(hs2, cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))), wceq(co(cfv(c0, cin(cv(hs2), cv(hs0))), cxad, cfv(c0, cdif(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)))), cfv(c0, cv(hs2)))))

  caragen0(c1, c0, w0)
  fvres(emptycls, c1, c0)
  ome0(c0, w0)
  3eqtr4d(cfv(cres(c0, c1), ciun(hs1, cn, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), cfv(csumge0, cmpt(hs1, cn, cfv(cres(c0, c1), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), cfv(c0, ciun(hs1, cn, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), cfv(csumge0, cmpt(hs1, cn, cfv(c0, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), w3a(w0, wf(cv(hs0), cn, c1), wdisj(hs1, cn, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))

  simp1(w0, wf(cv(hs0), cn, c1), wdisj(hs1, cn, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))

blocks.name: isomenndlem
blocks.content: ` O ` is sub-additive w.r.t. countable indexed union, implies that ` O ` is sub-additive w.r.t. countable union. Thus, the definition of Outer Measure can be given using an indexed union. Definition 113A of [Fremlin1] p. 19 . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm isomenndlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(c0, cuni(c1)), cle, cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, cpw(c2), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, emptycls), nat0))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, cpw(c2)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wf(cv(s0), cn, cpw(c2))), wbr(cfv(c0, ciun(s1, cn, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), cle, cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s1, cn, cfv(c0, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))

blocks.name: isomennd
blocks.content: Sufficient condition to prove that ` O ` is an outer measure. Definition 113A of [Fremlin1] p. 19 . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Oct-2020.)

  diff.cv.s(s2, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s2)
  diff.cmpt.s(s3, hs1, cn, if(hs1 ‚àà dom(hs0),(hs0 ` hs1), ‚àÖ))
  diff.wa.s(s2, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà P(dom(c0))), (dom(hs0)‚äÜ ‚Ñï ‚àß(hs0 : dom(hs0)‚Üî s0)))
  diff.wa.s(s2, w0, s0 ‚àà P(dom(c0)))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, s0, P(dom(c0)))
  diff.cpw.s(s2, dom(c0))
  diff.cdm.s(s2, c0)
  diff.wa.s(s2, dom(hs0)‚äÜ ‚Ñï, (hs0 : dom(hs0)‚Üî s0))
  diff.wss.s(s2, dom(hs0), cn)
  diff.cn.s(s2)
  diff.wf1o.s(s2, hs0, dom(hs0), s0)
  diff.cdm.s(s2, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wa.s(s3, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà P(dom(c0))), (dom(hs0)‚äÜ ‚Ñï ‚àß(hs0 : dom(hs0)‚Üî s0)))
  diff.wa.s(s3, w0, s0 ‚àà P(dom(c0)))
  diff.wcel.s(s3, s0, P(dom(c0)))
  diff.cpw.s(s3, dom(c0))
  diff.cdm.s(s3, c0)
  diff.wa.s(s3, dom(hs0)‚äÜ ‚Ñï, (hs0 : dom(hs0)‚Üî s0))
  diff.wss.s(s3, dom(hs0), cn)
  diff.wf1o.s(s3, hs0, dom(hs0), s0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diff.hs1.c(cn)
  diff.hs1.c(if(s3 ‚àà dom(hs0),(hs0 ` s3), ‚àÖ))
  diff.cn.s(s3)
  diff.cif.s(s3, (hs0 ` hs1), emptycls, hs1 ‚àà dom(hs0))

  diff.wcel.s(s3, hs1, dom(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s3, hs1)

  diff.hs1.s(s3)

}

blocks.name: caragenel2d
blocks.content: Membership in the Caratheodory's construction. Similar to ~ carageneld , but here "less then or equal to" is used, instead of equality. This is Remark 113D of [Fremlin1] p. 21. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 24-Dec-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm caragenel2d(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, come))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(cdm(c2)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ccaragen, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cpw(c3)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c3))), wbr(co(cfv(c2, cin(cv(s0), c0)), cxad, cfv(c2, cdif(cv(s0), c0))), cle, cfv(c2, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  carageneld(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  xrletrid(co(cfv(c2, cin(cv(s0), c0)), cxad, cfv(c2, cdif(cv(s0), c0))), cfv(c2, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c3))))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c3))), wcel(co(cfv(c2, cin(cv(s0), c0)), cxad, cfv(c2, cdif(cv(s0), c0))), cxr), wcel(cfv(c2, cin(cv(s0), c0)), cxr), wcel(cfv(c2, cdif(cv(s0), c0)), cxr))
  omexrcl(c2, cin(cv(s0), c0), c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c3))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c3)), wss(cin(cv(s0), c0), c3))
  syl5ss(cin(cv(s0), c0), c3, cv(s0), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c3)))
  inss1(cv(s0), c0)
  omexrcl(c2, cdif(cv(s0), c0), c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c3))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c3)), wss(cdif(cv(s0), c0), c3))
  ssdifssd(cv(s0), c0, c3, wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c3)))
  xaddcl(cfv(c2, cin(cv(s0), c0)), cfv(c2, cdif(cv(s0), c0)))
  omexrcl(c2, cv(s0), c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c3))))
  omelesplit(c2, cv(s0), c0, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c3))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c3)), wcel(c2, come))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c3)), wss(cv(s0), c3))
  elpwi(cv(s0), c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm caragenel2d(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà OutMeas)
  ‚ä£ c3 = ‚ãÉ dom(c2)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(CaraGen ` c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà P(c3))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà P(c3))‚Üí((c2 `(s0 ‚ãÇ c0))[+](c2 `(s0 \ c0)))[‚â§](c2 ` s0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  carageneld(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  xrletrid(((c2 `(s0 ‚ãÇ c0))[+](c2 `(s0 \ c0))), (c2 ` s0), (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà P(c3)))
  syl2anc((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà P(c3)), ((c2 `(s0 ‚ãÇ c0))[+](c2 `(s0 \ c0)))‚àà ‚Ñù*, (c2 `(s0 ‚ãÇ c0))‚àà ‚Ñù*, (c2 `(s0 \ c0))‚àà ‚Ñù*)
  omexrcl(c2, (s0 ‚ãÇ c0), c3, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà P(c3)))
  adantl(w0, s0 ‚àà P(c3), (s0 ‚ãÇ c0)‚äÜ c3)
  syl5ss((s0 ‚ãÇ c0), c3, s0, s0 ‚àà P(c3))
  inss1(s0, c0)
  omexrcl(c2, (s0 \ c0), c3, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà P(c3)))
  adantl(w0, s0 ‚àà P(c3), (s0 \ c0)‚äÜ c3)
  ssdifssd(s0, c0, c3, s0 ‚àà P(c3))
  xaddcl((c2 `(s0 ‚ãÇ c0)), (c2 `(s0 \ c0)))
  omexrcl(c2, s0, c3, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà P(c3)))
  omelesplit(c2, s0, c0, c3, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà P(c3)))
  adantr(w0, s0 ‚àà P(c3), c2 ‚àà OutMeas)
  adantl(w0, s0 ‚àà P(c3), s0 ‚äÜ c3)
  elpwi(s0, c3)
}

blocks.name: omege0
blocks.content: If the outer measure of a set is greater than or equal to ` 0 ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 24-Dec-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm omege0(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c0, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, come))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(cdm(c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, c2))
} = {
  syl3anc(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c0, c1)), wcel(nat0, cxr), wcel(cpnf, cxr), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  a1i(w0, wcel(nat0, cxr))
  0xr()
  a1i(w0, wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  pnfxr()
  omecl(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  iccgelb(nat0, cpnf, cfv(c0, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm omege0(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí 0[‚â§](c0 ` c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà OutMeas)
  ‚ä£ c2 = ‚ãÉ dom(c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚äÜ c2)
} = {
  syl3anc(w0, 0[‚â§](c0 ` c1), 0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, +‚àû ‚àà ‚Ñù*, (c0 ` c1)‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû))
  a1i(w0, 0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*)
  0xr()
  a1i(w0, +‚àû ‚àà ‚Ñù*)
  pnfxr()
  omecl(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  iccgelb(nat0, cpnf, (c0 ` c1))
}

blocks.name: omess0
blocks.content: If the outer measure of a set is ` 0 ` , then the outer measure of its subsets is ` 0 ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 24-Dec-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm omess0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, come))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(cdm(c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c3, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c3), nat0))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, c3))
} = {
  xrletrid(cfv(c0, c1), nat0, w0)
  omexrcl(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(nat0, cxr))
  0xr()
  breqtrd(cfv(c0, c1), cle, nat0, cfv(c0, c3), w0)
  omessle(c0, c1, c3, c2, w0)
  omege0(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  sstrd(c1, c2, c3, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm omess0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)= 0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà OutMeas)
  ‚ä£ c2 = ‚ãÉ dom(c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚äÜ c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c3)= 0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚äÜ c3)
} = {
  xrletrid((c0 ` c1), nat0, w0)
  omexrcl(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  a1i(w0, 0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*)
  0xr()
  breqtrd((c0 ` c1), cle, nat0, (c0 ` c3), w0)
  omessle(c0, c1, c3, c2, w0)
  omege0(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  sstrd(c1, c2, c3, w0)
}

blocks.name: caragencmpl
blocks.content: A measure built with the Caratheodory's construction is complete. See Definition 112Df of [Fremlin1] p. 19. This is Exercise 113Xa of [Fremlin1] p. 21 (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 24-Dec-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm caragencmpl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, come))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(cdm(c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c2, c0), nat0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ccaragen, c2))
} = {
  caragenel2d(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  mpbird(w0, wcel(c0, cpw(c3)), wss(c0, c3))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cpw(c3)), wss(c0, c3)), wcel(c0, universe))
  ssexd(c0, c3, universe, w0)
  unidmex(c3, c2, come, w0)
  elpwg(c0, universe, c3)
  eqbrtrd(co(cfv(c2, cin(cv(hs0), c0)), cxad, cfv(c2, cdif(cv(hs0), c0))), cle, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cdif(cv(hs0), c0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c3))))
  eqtrd(co(cfv(c2, cin(cv(hs0), c0)), cxad, cfv(c2, cdif(cv(hs0), c0))), cfv(c2, cdif(cv(hs0), c0)), co(nat0, cxad, cfv(c2, cdif(cv(hs0), c0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c3))))
  oveq1d(cfv(c2, cin(cv(hs0), c0)), cxad, cfv(c2, cdif(cv(hs0), c0)), nat0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c3))))
  omess0(c2, cin(cv(hs0), c0), c3, c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c3))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c3)), wss(c0, c3))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c3)), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), nat0))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c3))), wss(cin(cv(hs0), c0), c0))
  inss2(cv(hs0), c0)
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c3))), wceq(co(nat0, cxad, cfv(c2, cdif(cv(hs0), c0))), cfv(c2, cdif(cv(hs0), c0))), wcel(cfv(c2, cdif(cv(hs0), c0)), cxr))
  omexrcl(c2, cdif(cv(hs0), c0), c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c3))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c3)), wss(cdif(cv(hs0), c0), c3))
  sstrd(cdif(cv(hs0), c0), c3, cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c3)))
  xaddid2(cfv(c2, cdif(cv(hs0), c0)))
  omessle(c2, cdif(cv(hs0), c0), cv(hs0), c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c3))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c3)), wcel(c2, come))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c3)), wss(cv(hs0), c3))
  elpwi(cv(hs0), c3)
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c3)), wss(cdif(cv(hs0), c0), cv(hs0)))
  difssd(cv(hs0), c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c3)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm caragencmpl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà OutMeas)
  ‚ä£ c3 = ‚ãÉ dom(c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚äÜ c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c2 ` c0)= 0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(CaraGen ` c2)
} = {
  caragenel2d(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  mpbird(w0, c0 ‚àà P(c3), c0 ‚äÜ c3)
  syl(w0, (c0 ‚àà P(c3)‚Üî c0 ‚äÜ c3), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  ssexd(c0, c3, universe, w0)
  unidmex(c3, c2, come, w0)
  elpwg(c0, universe, c3)
  eqbrtrd(((c2 `(hs0 ‚ãÇ c0))[+](c2 `(hs0 \ c0))), cle, (c2 ` hs0), (c2 `(hs0 \ c0)), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(c3)))
  eqtrd(((c2 `(hs0 ‚ãÇ c0))[+](c2 `(hs0 \ c0))), (c2 `(hs0 \ c0)), (0[+](c2 `(hs0 \ c0))), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(c3)))
  oveq1d((c2 `(hs0 ‚ãÇ c0)), cxad, (c2 `(hs0 \ c0)), nat0, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(c3)))
  omess0(c2, (hs0 ‚ãÇ c0), c3, c0, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(c3)))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà P(c3), c0 ‚äÜ c3)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà P(c3), (c2 ` c0)= 0)
  a1i((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(c3)), (hs0 ‚ãÇ c0)‚äÜ c0)
  inss2(hs0, c0)
  syl((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(c3)), (0[+](c2 `(hs0 \ c0)))=(c2 `(hs0 \ c0)), (c2 `(hs0 \ c0))‚àà ‚Ñù*)
  omexrcl(c2, (hs0 \ c0), c3, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(c3)))
  adantl(w0, hs0 ‚àà P(c3), (hs0 \ c0)‚äÜ c3)
  sstrd((hs0 \ c0), c3, hs0, hs0 ‚àà P(c3))
  xaddid2((c2 `(hs0 \ c0)))
  omessle(c2, (hs0 \ c0), hs0, c3, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(c3)))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà P(c3), c2 ‚àà OutMeas)
  adantl(w0, hs0 ‚àà P(c3), hs0 ‚äÜ c3)
  elpwi(hs0, c3)
  adantl(w0, hs0 ‚àà P(c3), (hs0 \ c0)‚äÜ hs0)
  difssd(hs0, c0, hs0 ‚àà P(c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}
